Package ohos.security

Class SystemPermission

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.security.SystemPermission

  • public final class SystemPermission
extends Object
    Provides HarmonyOS system permissions, including the description, grant mode, and available scope of each permission.
    Since:
    4
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Security.Permission

    • Field Detail

      • ACCELEROMETER

        public static final String ACCELEROMETER
        Allows an application to read data from an acceleration sensor, uncalibrated acceleration sensor, or linear acceleration sensor.

        Value: ohos.permission.ACCELEROMETER

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:all

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESS_BIOMETRIC

        public static final String ACCESS_BIOMETRIC
        Allows an application to use biometric recognition for identity authentication.

        This permission allows the following operations: check the biometric recognition capability of the device, customize the authentication dialog box, start biometric recognition, and obtain biometric recognition prompts.

        Value: ohos.permission.ACCESS_BIOMETRIC

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:all

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESS_BIOMETRIC_INTERNAL

        public static final String ACCESS_BIOMETRIC_INTERNAL
        Allows a system application to apply for or release biometric recognition resources.

        Value: ohos.permission.ACCESS_BIOMETRIC_INTERNAL

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:signature

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESS_DISTRIBUTED_ABILITY

        @Deprecated
public static final String ACCESS_DISTRIBUTED_ABILITY
        Deprecated. 
        Ohos permission ohos.permission.ACCESS_DISTRIBUTED_ABILITY has been deprecated, and there is no longer available @since 4, please delete it directly.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESS_FM_AM

        public static final String ACCESS_FM_AM
        Allows an application to access radio services.

        With this permission, an application can perform operations such as setting the radio mode, adjusting the radio frequency by a fixed step, and searching for a radio frequency.

        Value: ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:all

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESS_HW_ASSETSTORE_SERVICE

        public static final String ACCESS_HW_ASSETSTORE_SERVICE
        Allows a system application to call some privileged APIs of Asset.

        This permission allows the following operations: adding, deleting, modifying, and querying Asset keys, and importing, exporting, cloning and backing up Asset data with less than 64 bytes (such as the user password, credit card number, and application service token).

        Value: ohos.permission.ACCESS_HW_ASSETSTORE_SERVICE

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:all

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESS_HW_KEYSTORE

        public static final String ACCESS_HW_KEYSTORE

        Value: ohos.permission.ACCESS_HW_KEYSTORE

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:all

        Since:
        3
        See Also:

      • ACCESS_UDID

        public static final String ACCESS_UDID
        Allows a system application to obtain the Unified Device ID (UDID).

        The UDID uniquely identifies a device. This permission is intended for system applications only.

        Value: ohos.permission.sec.ACCESS_UDID

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:signature, privileged

        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECT_ACCESSIBILITY_ABILITY

        public static final String CONNECT_ACCESSIBILITY_ABILITY
        Allows an auxiliary service of the accessibility service to be bound with the accessibility service.

        An auxiliary service that is not bound with the accessibility service is not displayed in settings.

        Value: ohos.permission.CONNECT_ACCESSIBILITY_ABILITY

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:signature

        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECT_IME_ABILITY

        public static final String CONNECT_IME_ABILITY
        Allows a system application or service to bind the InputMethodAbility.

        After binding the InputMethodAbility, the application or service can manage functions such as starting and stopping input, and displaying and hiding the keyboard.

        Value: ohos.permission.CONNECT_IME_ABILITY

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:signature

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECT_SCREEN_SAVER_ABILITY

        public static final String CONNECT_SCREEN_SAVER_ABILITY
        Allows a system application or service to bind the ScreenSaverAbility.

        After binding the ScreenSaverAbility, the application or service can manage functions such as entering and exiting the screen saver mode.

        Value: ohos.permission.CONNECT_SCREEN_SAVER_ABILITY

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:signature

        Since:
        3
        See Also:

      • RUNNING_LOCK

        public static final String RUNNING_LOCK
        Allows an application to obtain a running lock.

        The running lock prevents the system from hibernating so that the application running in the background will not be interrupted.

        Value: ohos.permission.RUNNING_LOCK

        Grant Mode: system_grant

        Available Scope:all

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
